title: Archive: England v Germany - Euro 1996
body_text:
Archive: England v Germany - Euro 1996
This content is not available in your location.
There was an error
Relive England's Euro 96 semi-final against Germany at Wembley, which ends in a penalty shootout.
Watch England v Germany from Euro 96 in full on Saturday 27 June, 13:15 BST on BBC One and iPlayer.
Watch Uefa Euro 2020 next summer across the BBC.
